channel.title: [508] RuneHub V2 [508] MUCH EPIC PLZ
channel.description:
Right now I'm trying to clean out the server, but I fail at real java so I probably won't get lots cleaned :(
Anyways, I released V1 so you can go see the download for that in the download section.
Soooooooooooooo, pictures!! (proof of devo)
[IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/16jhg7d.jpg[/img]
That's just my proof that I'm working on this. I really don't want to get it locked because of lack of pictures. I also released my V1 like I said earlier so if you want more proof, check that out.
Alright so hopefully I'll get a lot done over the weekend (I'm also training my RuneScape 10 hp pure, so im busy). Here are my goals:
Goals:
Clearer text Uniqueness (This is a big one) PvP point system PvP awarding/rewarding (This means if you kill someone you get a random pvp item) Statuetts!!!!!!! (everyone loves these!) Statue cashing in to Mandrith for cash. L2 figure out to make non-safe areas wildy. (If anyone could help... even Davidi2 even though I hate him :)) Shops (this is a pain in the ass so badly)
Yeah.

item.title: [508] RuneHub V2 [508] MUCH EPIC PLZ

Lock this.

I’m still working on it like 24/7 but I don’t feel like maintaining the thread AND the server.

item.title: [508] RuneHub V2 [508] MUCH EPIC PLZ
item.dc:creator: @jeddac jeddac
item.description:
@jeddac wrote:

No offence but everyone HATES statuettes… they’ve ruined RS as it is now, avoid adding them + random pvp, both ruin economies.

Good luck anyway

Read full topic
